DOC.brief_summary: The aim study two-fold : 1 ) To study risk factor development postpartum depression , include cognitive factor ( i.e. , perseverative negative thinking interpretation infant facial expression ) , factor negative childhood experience , parental attachment , parental stress previous psychopathology . 2 ) Investigate effect The Newborn Behavioral Observation ( NBO ) universal prevention intervention implement well-baby clinic Tromsø regard parental mental health , parent-infant interaction child development .
DOC.brief_title: Northern Babies : A Study Predictors Postpartum Depression Parent-infant Interaction Difficulties
DOC.detailed_description: This longitudinal observational study intervention . The observational part study use prospective cohort design . To compare intervention group receive The Newborn Behavioral Observation ( NBO ) control group receive standard health care investigator use non-randomized cluster control design , since neither cluster randomization , randomization individual level feasible routine practice set . Parents infant belong two well-baby clinic Tromsø , Norway offer NBO intervention . Parents infant belong rest well-baby clinic municipality Tromsø receive standard health care , i.e . treatment usual constitute control group . Participants recruit midwifes Midwife Center general practitioner ( GPs ) municipality Tromsø . Midwifes GPs inform project research group . The participant recruit ( approximately ) week 16 gestation , first visit Midwife Center , earlier first trimester GP . At recruitment parent inform receive standard health care delivery , give new consultation method public health nurse . All pregnant woman expect father speak Norwegian eligible inclusion study . Based experience comparable study , `` Little Norway '' , investigator expect 25 % pregnant woman ( expect father ) municipality Tromsø participate specified time period , i.e . 500 family total . For observational part study , assessment perform five time point : The first assessment week 16 - 22 gestation , second week 24 - 30 gestation , third week 31 gestation , fourth 6 week post-delivery fifth 4 month post-delivery . For intervention study pre-intervention measure take place week 31 gestation , post-intervention measure 6 week post-delivery follow-up measure 4 month 6 month post-delivery . In addition , parent ask fill questionnaire regard experience intervention three NBO consultation . Also , NBO consultation , health worker conduct intervention fill form judgment infant along four dimension : autonomic , motor , state organization attentional-interactional . The data collect questionnaire administer Internet . The researcher contact parent ask complete measure Internet . The exception NBO questionnaire mention complete conjunction NBO consultation , The Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale ( EPDS ) 6 week post-delivery collect public health nurse use paper-and- pencil version well- baby clinic part routine practice . Also researcher meet family week 16 gestation inclusion , 6 week 4 6 month post-delivery .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman expect father Speak Norwegian Not pregnant Do speak Norwegian
